name: Plant Planter
description:
Plant planter is an idle game where you have to manage the plant's water, sunlight, bugs, and more. Keep the meters in the sweet spot to maximize your gains! Buy upgrades to improve your clicking and idle gains, and craft powerful potions to boost your production to the moon. --note, all you see is all you get, this project is in development and there are no hidden achievements or unlockable sections of the game.

-Made by Matthew Collard

-Graphics by Yichen Jiang

-Ideas and mechanics by -Matthew Collard, Yichen Jiang, Sawyer Tang, Aamina Hussian, Mehak Khan
